mapper.update:
update o_goods
type = #{type},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
category_code = #{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refer_id = #{referId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
base_price = #{basePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
try_watch = #{tryWatch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_free = #{isFree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
on_time = #{onTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
off_time = #{offTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
visible_range = #{visibleRange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
open_tag = #{openTag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
saas_id = #{saasId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:

name,
category_id,
category_code,
